trans-unit.source: The operation selector that supports the Web programming model.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector> dispatches method calls based on matching the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to a <xref:System.UriTemplateTable>.
If multiple matches are found in the <xref:System.UriTemplateTable>, dispatch is done by the HTTP method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector"></xref> with the specified endpoint.
The service endpoint.
Gets the <xref href="System.UriTemplate"></xref> associated with the specified operation name.
The operation.
The <xref href="System.UriTemplate"></xref> for the specified operation.
The name of the message property on the request message that provides the name of the selected operation for the request.
A string used as a key for storing the value that indicates whether a call to a service operation was matched by the URI but not by the HTTP method.
Two different errors can occur when calling a service operation: "404 Endpoint/URI not found" and "405 Method Not Allowed."
This string and its associated Boolean value allow the service model to differentiate between these two errors.
The "404 Endpoint/URI" error occurs when an invalid URI is used.
The "405 Method Not Allowed" error occurs when a valid URI is used but the HTTP method was not valid for the URI.
Selects the service operation to call.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> object sent to invoke a service operation.
The name of the service operation to call.
Selects the service operation to call.
It is possible that an incoming URI matches an operation, but the HTTP method is not allowed by the operation.
In such cases, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime returns 404 (Not Found) when `uriMatched` is `false`, and returns 405 (Method Not Allowed) when `uriMatched` is `true`.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> object sent to invoke a service operation.
A value that specifies whether the URI matched a specific service operation.
The name of the service operation to call.
